New Records: India recorded the highest score of 357/8 in the match
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka were bowled out for 55, their lowest score in the tournament
Madushanka took crucial wickets including Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as favorites due to their strong form and home advantage
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of team balance and fitness
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's resilience and focus
Shubman Gill and Virat Kohli were highlighted for their key performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a dominant display of India's batting strength
Sri Lanka's bowling attack struggled to contain India's top order
Others: The match was played at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai
The result solidified India's position in the knockout stage of the World Cup
